forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny, with a high near 63. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As the early hours of Sunday unfold in Downtown San Francisco, a delicate hush blankets the city, punctuated only by the soft rustle of the west southwest breeze. The night’s slight chance of drizzle may have taken a few whispered moments to dance in the sky, while clouds linger over the skyline in gentle, gray whispers. The temperature remains comfortably cool, inviting a light jacket and perhaps a warming scarf for those venturing out. The anticipated day promises a gradual transition into patches of sun; as morning unfolds, the drizzle will likely give way to a calm embrace of partly sunny skies, though hints of that ever-looming marine layer may still curl around the edges of the Golden Gate.

With the high expected to hover around the mid-60s, the city appears painted in a muted palette, where the brilliance of the day is just waiting for a moment to shine through. One might contemplate a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the subtle freshness of the morning air collides with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee from nearby cafés. Casual gatherings in Dolores Park could beckon, as the clouds slowly part and allow for laughter to fill the spaces. Today’s needs are simple, comfortable layers that offer versatility; light sweaters paired with a breathable top should carry one through the changing moods of the day. In this enticing interlude of urban charm and natural beauty, even a mere walk can transform into a thoughtful exploration of the city’s quiet elegance.
